CustomField.formula: IF( Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business North' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business North NSW 1' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business North NSW 2' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business North NSW 3' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business North QLD' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South SA/NT' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South VIC 1' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South VIC 2' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South VIC 3' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Business South WA', 'Business South North', IF( Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales Central' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales North 1' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales North 2' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales North 3' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales South' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Inside Sales South 2', 'Inside Sales', IF( Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Parcel Key Accounts North' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Parcel Key Accounts South' || Owner:User.UserRole.RollupDescription = 'Parcel Partner Sales', 'Key Account Partner', '' )))
CustomField.label: Assigned Role Group
